Polestar raises almost $1 bln, sees margins improving in 2024Polestar said on Wednesday it had raised a $950 million loan from a bank syndicate, helping to fill a gap left when Volvo Cars said it would stop funding the electric carmaker. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 14:22:58 GMT CDJ46BO5BJMDVPSUQSOALPI3BU https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/polestar-raises-almost-1-bln-sees-margins-improving-2024-2024-02-28/Marie Mannes商业汽车与交通
India, South Africa block investment deal at WTO talksIndia and South Africa have filed a formal objection against an investment agreement at a World Trade Organization meeting in Abu Dhabi, blocking its adoption, a document showed and delegates confirmed on Wednesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 14:21:18 GMT XJFPCQG7LRPTXDYMGNZ3​​EQTD6A https://www.reuters.com/world/india-south-africa-block-investment-deal-wto-talks-2024-02-28/Reuters可持续发展气候与能源
India seeks reforms on agriculture, disputes system at WTO meetingIndia hopes to reach a deal on a key element of agricultural reform as well as the restoration of the World Trade Organization's arbitration powers at a high-level meeting in Abu Dhabi this week, its trade minister said on Wednesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 14:01:21 GMT PVZADGLB3BILRM4PSCBCYIYERM https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-seeks-reforms-agriculture-disputes-system-wto-meeting-2024-02-28/Rachna Uppal可持续发展气候与能源
Italy talks to Tesla, Chinese carmakers in search for second auto producerItaly has been in talks with Tesla and three Chinese carmakers as it tries to attract another manufacturer and reach an annual output target of 1.3 million vehicles, the industry minister said on Wednesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 13:53:51 GMT SQNGK7ZUE5NQTLPJZYP235L3FM https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/italy-talks-tesla-others-search-second-carmaker-2024-02-28/Giuseppe Fonte, Giulio Piovaccari商业汽车与交通
Republican senator wants to hike tariffs on Chinese vehiclesRepublican Senator Josh Hawley is introducing on Wednesday legislation to hike tariffs on Chinese vehicle imports amid growing concerns about the impact of these vehicles on U.S. car companies. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 12:06:24 GMT YAIMPVUBLBBIERKOWCNNYK343HI https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/republican-senator-wants-hike-tariffs-chinese-vehicles-2024-02-28/David Shepardson商业汽车与交通
China's Premier Li urges stronger economic, trade ties with USChina and the United States should strengthen economic and trade ties and Washington should avoid decoupling from China, Chinese Premier Li Qiang said on Wednesday, during a meeting with a visiting U.S. delegation, Chinese state radio reported. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 11:36:50 GMT ZU6WLQL5JJPZPJCGVCIP7GUKN4 https://www.reuters.com/business/chinas-premier-li-urges-stronger-economic-trade-ties-with-us-2024-02-28/Reuters商业
